1.verse: Hear me when I call, O God of my righteousness: thou hast enlarged me when I was in distress; have mercy upon me, and hear my prayer.

2.verse: O ye sons of men, how long will ye turn my glory into shame? how long will ye love vanity, and seek after leasing? Selah.

3.verse: But know that the LORD hath set apart him that is godly for himself: the LORD will hear when I call unto him.

4.verse: Stand in awe, and sin not: commune with your own heart upon your bed, and be still. Selah.

5.verse: Offer the sacrifices of righteousness, and put your trust in the LORD.

6.verse: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? LORD, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.

7.verse: Thou hast put gladness in my heart, more than in the time that their corn and their wine increased.

8.verse: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, LORD, only makest me dwell in safety.
